item.title: Client Authentication
item.description: Client Authentication Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: Straight port from Redocly. Might need a bit more editing and extra context? Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: https://developer.okta.com/docs/api/openapi/okta-oauth/guides/client-auth/ Structure type: Reference Content type: Reference lookup Reference lookups consist mostly of a series of tables or lists where users can look up facts or definitions, interspersed with short explanatory texts that give those tables the correct context.

item.title: Dynamic Client Registration
item.description: Dynamic Client Registration Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: Straight port from Redocly Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: https://developer.okta.com/docs/api/openapi/okta-oauth/oauth/tag/Client/ Structure type: Reference Content type: API reference API references contain comprehensive descriptions of APIs, including endpoints, methods, parameters, data types, authentication, and examples of how to use them. They serve as a technical guide for developers to understand the API’s functionality.
